Material used.Description: Mitochondrial respiratory function was analyzed in fibroblasts from a patient with the PINK1 mutation.

Readout description.Result Description: Reduced mitochondrial respiratory activity, impaired ATP production via glycolysis, and decreased cytochrome c oxidase activity in patient fibroblasts.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Basic negative control.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Standard mitochondrial respiratory activity (e.g., normal OCR and ATP production rates).

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Significantly reduced OCR, ATP production, or cytochrome c oxidase activity compared to controls.

Material used.Description: ROS production was measured in patient fibroblasts.

Readout description.Result Description: Increased ROS production in patient fibroblasts.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Basic negative control.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Standard ROS levels (e.g., within 10% of control values).

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: ROS levels exceeding 20% of control values.
